sub_title: SQE BP for Software as Medical Devices at Philips Netherlands
summary:
Supplier Quality Manager – Responsible for delivering all aspects of the Supplier Operations Quality
Assurance function on an on-going basis in line with the Quality Management System.  

About Me: Certified 6 sigma professional and lead auditor for ISO 13485 & ISO 9001. 17 years of professional experience. Proven abilities to work as a leader, facilitator to enhance team building, supplier development and improvement, optimize resource & capacity utilization, on time delivery of project schedule; escalate productivity & operational efficiency to business unit targets within the frame work of the organisation’s philosophy. Good exposure to work along with supplier 
and cross functional teams (based onshore or offshore), understanding their requirement and provide tailored made solutions. Quick learner and go-getter attitude.  

Active US B1/B2 visa till 2024

projects.title: Deployment of European union medical device regulation
projects.description: Leader for all activities towards upstream and downstream supply chain management of EU MDR requirements.

contributors.headline: SQE BP for Software as Medical Devices at Philips Netherlands

profile_positions.description:
Strategy and Development:
1. Contribute to the creation and implementation of best practice quality vision, strategy, policies, processes and procedures to aid and improve operational performance
2. Contribute to new business initiatives and projects and review and communicate the impact on Supplier Quality activities

General and Task Management:
1. Lead supplier quality performance strategy, Achieving the metrics for the function and supplier quality performance
2. Carry out supplier validation audits, with supplier support and supplier advanced product quality planning (APQP)
3. Support Purchasing with the supplier approval process by assessing manufacturing/technology capabilities and Health, Safety and Environmental risks
4. Support new product launches to ensure suppliers are capable of delivering to the required quality standards
5. Manage the root cause analysis and corrective actions process of supplier quality issues
6. Review and evaluate supplier quality data to identify process improvement opportunities within the supply chain
7. Promote the use of customer preferred techniques for continuous improvement such as Lean, Six-Sigma, Poka-Yoke (Error Proofing), Measurement System Analysis and FMEA (Failure Mode and Effects
Analysis)
8. Ensure compliance and assist SQ function with adherence to the Quality Management System
9.Support regular review meetings with representatives from appropriate departments to establish an action plan for improving collaboration and quality
10. Responsible for providing leadership, outstanding people skills and management to a team of Operational Supplier Quality Engineers.
profile_positions.title: Supplier Quality Manager for operations

profile_positions.description:
- Philips business process expert in purchasing control and supplier quality management system
- Govern, design and implement relevant parts of the process
- Execute supplier development projects
- Admin the all relevant system tools for the site Pune (GSRS, Metric Stream, SNC and ARIBA)
- Member of Processes & Systems Reference Board Philips Global

Major Achievement: 
1. Deploy all ongoing system tools for procurement function, putting Pune at par with global sites (SAP R3 applications as well as other workflow solutions)
2. Run supplier remediation program and improved the supplier documentation compliance for all existing suppliers
3. Upgraded the site procurement compliance level to as per US FDA requirements and scored zero non conformance in all external body audits 
4. Run a supplier development project based on six sigma methodology resulting in Philips savings of 4 Million INR by reducing the quality rejection
profile_positions.title: PROCESSES & SYSTEMS MANAGER

profile_positions.description:
Centum Learning Limited is part of Airtel group (One of the leading telecom company across globe) 

1. To provide guidance to circle team through process, technical and ERP functional support with ultimate goal of process implementation, improving performance, efficiency and profitability
2. Assessing baseline levels of Operational Excellence (Using 6 sigma methods) and then identifying, monitoring and executing action plan to continually increase level of operational excellence to enable increased performance, productivity, consistency, and on time delivery of service/deliverable's
3. Acting as a Process Excellence: coach, developer, guide, and serving as an internal  process performance consultant to function & interfacing functional heads/partners

Major Achievements: Improved the six sigma ranking of circle from last position to top position in all of 11 telecom circles.
profile_positions.title: Circle Process Quality  Leader

profile_positions.description:
1. Act as Supplier Quality Development Manager for ALSTOM for key supplier for 5 European sites at Bahrain 
2. Providing expert knowledge of problem solving methodologies to enable delivery of exceptional performance through a systematic, standardized, and consistent approach to project  selection/execution, and process design/improvement
3. Facilitating structured discussions and performing focused analysis in order to identify root causes and present improvement recommendations/solutions  

Achievement=> 
ALSTOM TRANSPORT project as Supplier Quality Development, responsible for supplier quality assurance and development for sustainable quality performance. Responsible for providing
leadership, outstanding people skills and management to a team of Supplier Quality Engineers.

Work Done=> Detailed study / audit was performed for quality and production processes. For those processes requiring rework, business process improvement sessions were conducted with client staff and management. Pareto, FMEA, 5 why analysis done, PDCA, 8D reports crated and communication issues resolved with client by regular conf calls and reports on mutually agreed format. Project management and co-ordination with 5 European sites to resolve the project delivery issues from supplier
